author: Joe Green
description:
Stocks in US AI technology companies fell in value at the close of trading yesterday, with the NASDAQ Composite index down 1.4%. Among those losing value were Palantir, down 9.4% and Arm Holdings down 5%. According to the Financial Times [paywall], Tuesday saw the biggest one-day fall in the market since the beginning of August. […]

The post Gen AI makes no financial difference in 95% of cases appeared first on AI News.
title: Gen AI makes no financial difference in 95% of cases

author: Ryan Daws
description:
Google Cloud believes the answer to overworked security teams isn’t just more tools, but an AI-powered ally. At its Security Summit 2025, Google laid out its vision for a future where AI frees up human security experts from tedious work to focus on what matters most. The central idea is to use AI to defend […]

The post Google Cloud unveils AI ally for security teams appeared first on AI News.
title: Google Cloud unveils AI ally for security teams

author: AI News
description:
In March Yext, the leading brand visibility platform, launched Yext Scout, an AI search and competitive intelligence agent designed to give brands visibility and actionable insights across both traditional and AI-driven search platforms. Integrated within the Yext platform, Scout provides insights into visibility across traditional and AI search platforms, benchmarks performance against competitors, and delivers […]

The post Yext Unveils Scout and Launches Webinar to Help Brands Stay Visible in AI & Local Search appeared first on AI News.
title: Yext Unveils Scout and Launches Webinar to Help Brands Stay Visible in AI & Local Search

author: Muhammad Zulhusni
description:
Nvidia is working on a new AI chip for China that could be stronger than the H20 model it currently sells there, according to people familiar with the plans, Reuters reported. The chip will be based on the company’s latest Blackwell design. Last week, US President Donald Trump suggested that more advanced Nvidia chips might […]

The post New Nvidia Blackwell chip for China may outpace H20 model appeared first on AI News.
title: New Nvidia Blackwell chip for China may outpace H20 model
